name: SRK - Mock Old SRK Black Theme (Lazy)
description: This style and its color scheme are based on the old "SRK Black" theme that was once available to premium members of Shoryuken.com. A large portion of this code is edited from code written by two SRK members, Kyle and Icy Black Deep.
additional_info: Applies to URLs starting with: http://shoryuken.com/.
